sqlGroup.sql: select t1.*,t2.name as 'type',t3.name as 'series',t4.name as 'brand',t5.name as 'manf' from ( select id,name,ly_id,`status`,t_id from car where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(name)){ %> AND name like #'%$name$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(ly_id)){ %> AND ly_id = #'$ly_id$'# <% } %> limit #$begRow$#,#$pageSize$# )t1 left join car_type t2 on t1.t_id=t2.id left join car_series t3 on t2.s_id=t3.id left join car_brand t4 on t3.b_id=t4.id left join car_manf t5 on t4.m_id=t5.id
select count(*) from car where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(name)){ %> AND name like #'%$name$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(ly_id)){ %> AND ly_id = #'$ly_id$'# <% } %>

from( select t1.*,t2.name as 'type',t3.name as 'series',t4.name as 'brand',t5.name as 'manf' from ( select id,name,ly_id,`status`,t_id from car where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(name)){ %> AND name like #'%$name$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(ly_id)){ %> AND ly_id = #'$ly_id$'# <% } %> )t1 left join car_type t2 on t1.t_id=t2.id left join car_series t3 on t2.s_id=t3.id left join car_brand t4 on t3.b_id=t4.id left join car_manf t5 on t4.m_id=t5.id )t
